exhibition_description: A collection of masterworks from the Post-Impressionist period
work_description: This iconic painting from 1889 depicts a swirling night sky over a small French village.
work_historical_context: Van Gogh created this masterpiece during one of the most difficult periods of his life.

exhibition_description: A collection of masterworks from the Post-Impressionist period
work_description: Part of Van Gogh's famous sunflower series, showcasing his bold use of yellow.
work_historical_context: Van Gogh created the sunflower series while living in Arles, France.
